textEditor

Class MakeSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • textEditor.MakeSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class MakeSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Execution of a MakeSelection command. A class present ever since version 1. It has been adjusted for versions 2 and 3 by adding the implementation of the redo, undo and shouldBeAddedToHistory methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MakeSelection(IEditorEngine _editorEngine, Pair<java.lang.Integer> _p) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Executes the setSelection command from the editorEngine.
      void redo() 
      boolean shouldBeAddedToHistory()
      A plain selection should not be added to history since undoing/redoing it will have no visible effect.
      void undo()

        public boolean shouldBeAddedToHistory()
